idea-plugin.name: IDEA Mind Map
idea-plugin.description: Mind map editor is adapted part of (SciaReto editor). Mind maps are saved as plain-text files in a Markdown compatible format (MMD). It is the best way to keep semantic information among project files, keep links and even sensitive info (in password protected notes encrypted by AES-256).
